title: Deluxe and Super Soft Brushed Microfiber Attached Waterbed Sheet Set with Pole Attachment, 3 Piece Super Single Size, Gold
features: Deluxe and Super Soft Brushed Microfiber Attached Waterbed Sheet set. The sheets are closely woven, keeping your comfort in mind and gets softer with each wash.

Fitted sheet pockets are made with POLE attachment for better hold. Fitted & flat sheets are attached at the footer so bed stays made. you can insert 12 inches long wooden or plastic pole that is 0.5 inches in thickness (any pole can be used as it’s NOT INCLUDED).
Breathable, durable and attractive. 4" hemming, flats & pillowcases
Easy Care - Wrinkle and Fade resistant, machine wash in cold water. Tumble dry on low.
Super Single Size Set Includes One Flat Sheet 55X96", One Fitted Sheet 48X84" and One Standard Pillowcase 20X30"
description: Sleep in luxury on a beautiful soft solid sheet set made of high quality brushed microfiber. Designed for waterbed use, the fitted sheet and flat sheet are sewn together at the foot to avoid slippage. Fitted sheet pockets are made with POLE attachment for better hold. This set is conveniently machine washable. Manufactured with care
